/* 게시글 상세정보 조회- /src/main/resources/mappers/postMapper.xml - selectPostDetail */ SELECT a.title , a.post_no , a.content , b.login_id , a.frst_regt_dt , a.latitude , a.longitude , a.last_updt_dt , a.view_cnt , b.nickname , a.thumbnail FROM tb_post AS a
LEFT JOIN tb_user AS b ON a.frst_regt_no = b.user_no WHERE 1=1 AND a.post_no = #{postNo} AND a.del_yn = 'N'

/* 첨부파일 리스트 불러오기 - /src/main/resources/mappers/postMapper.xml - selectFileList */ SELECT file_no , original_file_nm , stored_file_nm , ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM tb_file WHERE 1=1 AND del_yn = 'N' AND post_no = #{postNo} ORDER BY file_sn ASC
